body:
So I got this question in my mind..
Will the referee rank and the developer rank be included in the avicus.net/staff page?
I don't see why not and we'll have an idea of who are getting accepted for the ref position.
Also, I feel like some people don't know we have 2 developers, probably, you already know Ivy/Kylo but Pavilion is a developer too, he became 1 like 3 months ago.
That's it for this post!
Regards, Juan.

title: Regarding Ranks

replies.body: I'm pretty sure that we'll have a developer rank in the Omega update.
